entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
